name: Zhop
description:
Zhop is a free auto-running platformer where you run, jump and walljump through its  40+ levels - featuring 4 worlds, including a boss and a full tutorial on the game. I'd advise you download it, for a much better experience, but there is the option to do it web version. Also, the audio is a little distorted in the web version.

Features:

  • challenging gameplay
  • full pixel art
  • 8 unique chiptune songs - Soundtrack included
  • 34 levels
  • 4 tutorial levels
  • 4 boss levels
  • fun and interesting gimmicks

This is my second big game. I am planning on continuing to release big-ish games like this for free.  I appreciate all feedback - please tell me what you think of it! It really helps me knowing what people think - what you enjoyed, and what you didn't. Rate too, if you can! 

CREDITS:

Programming, music, art and game design by His-Games (HIM)

Font used: Tiny World's Fat font - https://www.dafont.com/thaleahfat.font, also on unity assets - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/free-pixel-font-thaleah-140059

Sound effects - Inspectorj's small splash on freesound.org

Stadium Flash also by Inspectorj
